definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: (´[[ח]] of the palm);—abode of Amorites Ge 14:7, LXX Asasan Qamar; [[חַחֲחוֹן תָּמָר הִיא עֵין גֶּדִָי]] 2Ch 20:2 base of operations for [[אֲרַם]] (rd. [[אֱדוֹם]]) ag. Judah (vid. Jos:Ant. ix, 1. 2); it was on W. side of Dead Sea (v. [[עֵין גֶּ֫דִי]]); see Rob:BR i, 500 – 509 Bd:Pal 143 GASm:Geogr. 269 ff.; Wady Ḥuṣāṣā (= [[חחחן]] ?) lies NW. fr. Engedi GASm:l. c. cf. Rob:BR i, 506 Bd:Pal 14 (map); GASm suggests also possibility of finding here [[תָּמָר]] 1Ki 9:18 Kt (= [[תַּדְמׂר]] Qr and 2Ch 8:4), Ez Eze 47:19, Eze 48:28 (v. [[תָּמָר]] n.pr.loc.)
